page.title: 08Population in Fremington
page.content: We interveiwed Mrs Dryden about were and when she used to live.She told us that she used to live in Slough just out side London.She said that you were more likely to get a job there than you would here.We interveiwed Mr Anderson who used to live in Dunfermline in Scotland he said that he used to work in the mine, but now he is an ambulance man.The reason why he moved down here was because his wife got very homesick.We interviewed Mrs Monson,she used to live in Kent.The reason why they moved down here was because her husband was a milkman he was transferd down here anyway they were glad about that because most of there relations were down here.
